column4: What's up with this error I'm getting at start up? modprobe: FATAL: Could not load /lib/modules/2.6.35-22-generic/modules.dep http://paste.ubuntu.com/514657/

- rockets - Sorry guys, I did do a clean install. I always do clean installs. I've never done a upgrade for the same reasons you guys don't. However, I did make the mistake (it appears) of coping over some compiz files hoping that I would keep my old settings. That's the only thing I copied from my old home directory.
